overview: Lan Hua Hua and Brother Yang are childhood sweethearts and playmates, and the relationship between the two is sincere and passionate. However, Lan Hua Hua was forced to marry a greedy and cunning landlord. Lan Hua Hua, who was unwilling to succumb to fate, decided to elope with Brother Yang on the wedding night.
title: Lan Hua Hua
